privacyPolicy.intro: We are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what we collect and how we use it.

sections.title: 1. What we collect
sections.text: Your email address (when subscribing) and anonymous usage data via cookies.

sections.title: 2. How we collect it
sections.text: Through the forms you complete and automatically via cookies.

sections.title: 3. Why we collect it
sections.text: To keep you informed with news and updates from CD Estepona Fans.

sections.title: 6. Contact
